physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Hypertension (SBP 200), tachycardia (heart rate 120's), mild epigastric tenderness, and a sensation of chest pressure relieved by SL nitro.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially hypertensive and tachycardic; subsequently, heart rate was recorded at 165 bpm, then improved to 73 bpm during physical examination.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: General: NCAT, NAD. HEENT: EOMI, PERRLA, dry mucous membranes. CV: nl S1S2, RRR, no murmurs/rubs/gallops. Pulm: CTAB. Abd: soft, nontender, nondistended, +BS. Extremities: +2 DP B/L, +2 radial pulses. Skin: no c/c/e.
